name: RAVEN-BOT
description: A simple yet complicated WhatsApp bot, ♤Enjoy♡

PREFIX.description: Prefix of RAVEN-BOT Ex: . , / , # , & etc. Put any symbol or leave it blank

DEV.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces "," Ex: 254114660061,27849061633

ANTIDELETE.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to foward back deleted messages. The messages will be fowarded to your Pm, Message yourself.

AUTOREJECT_CALL.description: Put TRUE if you want bot to decline all incoming calls

ANTIFOREIGN.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to automatically remove foreigners who are not from your country code joining a group

HEROKU_API.description: Put a Heroku api key here, will be required to update vars in your Dm

BAD_WORD.description: List words separated witj commas that will be considered as bad and will trigger bot to kick. Example: fuck, pussy, hoe

BAD_WORD_KICK.description: Put here TRUE if you want the bot to automatically kick group members using words that you have listed as bad

ANTITAG.description: Put TRUE if you want bot kick out unnecessary tags from a group, Not sure if its working eh!

AUTOREAD.description: Put here TRUE if you want bot to automatically bluetick messages in private chats

AUTOVIEW.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to automatically read status update

WA_PRESENCE.description: Input either recording, typing, online, or leave it blank. This enables bot to simulate typing or recording or online status even if you're not online.

WELCOMEGOODBYE.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to welcome new members joining group or wave goodbye to members leaving a group.

ANTILINK.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick link senders only whatsapp group links

ANTILINK_ALL.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick users sending any kind of link.

ANTIBOT.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick other bots from group

CODE.description: Input you country code here without + eg 254, it Will be used to Eliminate foreigners from the group once prompted.

MODE.description: Input PRIVATE if you don't want other people to use your bot

AUTOBIO.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to autoupdate its about with current time and date.

APP_NAME.description: Input your app name that you put above, Must be in small letters.

GPT_INBOX.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to autoreply inbox messages using openai API. For now not stable may cause spam!

MENU_LINK.description: Paste your Image Url here or use the default one, This will display it on your menu if you set MENU_TYPE as IMAGE.

MENU_TYPE.description: Input either VIDEO, LINK or IMAGE. This will allow bot to display different dynamic menu types

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: input TRUE if you want bot to autolike status updates. This will only work if autostatus view is TRUE
